name: Quartz
description: Quartz is one of the most abundant minerals in the Earth's crust. It comes in a wide variety of colors and forms and is used in many types of jewelry and other applications.

name: Diamond
description: Diamond is the hardest known natural material. It is a precious gemstone prized for its clarity and sparkle, and is often used in engagement rings and high-end jewelry.

name: Emerald
description: Emerald is a green gemstone and a variety of the mineral beryl. It has been highly valued since ancient times and is known for its vibrant green color.

name: Amethyst
description: Amethyst is a violet variety of quartz and is often used in jewelry. It has been highly valued for its striking color and historical significance in various cultures.

name: Opal
description: Opal is a unique gemstone known for its play-of-color, which is the ability to display various colors when viewed from different angles. It is often found in Australia.
